SpeechSynthesis.summary: The SpeechSynthesis interface of the Web Speech API is the controller interface for the speech service; this can be used to retrieve information about the synthesis voices available on the device, start and pause speech, and other commands besides.

SpeechSynthesisCancel.summary:
The cancel() method of the
interface removes all utterances from the utterance queue.

remarks.para: If an utterance is currently being spoken, speaking will stop immediately.

SpeechSynthesisGetVoices.summary:
The getVoices() method of the
interface returns a list of
objects representing all the available voices on the
current device.

SpeechSynthesisPause.summary:
The pause() method of the
interface puts the SpeechSynthesis object into a paused state.

SpeechSynthesisPaused.summary:
The paused read-only property of the
interface is a boolean value that returns
true if the SpeechSynthesis object is in a paused state, or false if not.

remarks.para:
It can be set to even if nothing is
currently being spoken through it. If
are then added to the utterance
queue, they will not be spoken until the SpeechSynthesis object is
unpaused, using .

SpeechSynthesisPending.summary:
The pending read-only property of the
interface is a boolean value that returns
true if the utterance queue contains as-yet-unspoken utterances.

SpeechSynthesisResume.summary:
The resume() method of the
interface puts the SpeechSynthesis object into a non-paused state:
resumes it if it was already paused.

SpeechSynthesisSpeak.summary:
The speak() method of the
interface adds an to the utterance
queue; it will be spoken when any other utterances queued before it have been spoken.

SpeechSynthesisSpeaking.summary:
The speaking read-only property of the
interface is a boolean value that returns
true if an utterance is currently in the process of being spoken â€” even
if SpeechSynthesis is in a
state.

SpeechSynthesisVoiceschanged.summary: The voiceschanged event of the Web Speech API is fired when the list of objects that would be returned by the method has changed (when the voiceschanged event fires.)
